divs: sighting detailson sunday, 10\12\2008 i was enjoying one of the last days of warm weather by lying out in our field, while reading. i looked up and saw an object that was pee sized, at arms length, moving rapidly across the sky in a se to nw direction. there is a woods about 1800 feet from my position. i first spotted the object, just over the woods, at what appeared to be at a high altitude. in a matter of 8-10 seconds this object traversed the sky, disappearing over a woods, opposite from where she first spotted this object. the time was approximately 5:00 pm est. would you have any idea what this could have been? and, have you received any other sightings, in this area, during this time frame? respectfully submitted, tammy johnson
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Yellow Springs
There were no other sightings in Yellow Springs on or around October 10th 2008
Summary: Object traversed the sky, horizon to horizon, in no more than 10 seconds
